attributes.action: Change the taxi laws in Trafford area
attributes.additional_details: I need as many people to sign this to get this law changed especially if you rely on taxis this is going to affect you in a big way you don’t know who is picking you up.
attributes.background:
Over the next few months in Trafford we are going to be seeing more and more Wolverhampton plated cars in the area.
First of all who is going to be checking theses drivers I’m sure Wolverhampton won’t have people checking in the Trafford area and second Trafford council have no authority to stop it

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like the law to be changed so that a taxi licensed in one area can't work in another area, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/209900
